import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete Invitation"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/content/invitations/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Delete and invalidate an existing invitation.

You can find more information about invitations and content [here](../../docs/guides/content/invitations).

**Note:** Expired invitations will be deleted automatically.

**Tokens:**
- A valid [`AccessToken`](../../docs/guides/auth/tokens#access-token)
  with [`ADMIN`](../../docs/guides/content/access-roles#admin) access on this resource is required.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"timestamp":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"date":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"}},"title":"ObjectId"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Success.","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"success":{"type":"boolean"}},"required":["success"],"title":"SuccessResponse"}}}},"401":{"description":"Invalid or expired `AccessToken`.","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"timestamp":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"error":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"},"path":{"type":"string"}},"required":["error","status","timestamp"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}},"403":{"description":"AccessToken does permit [`ADMIN`](../../docs/guides/content/access-roles#admins) access on this resource.","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"timestamp":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"error":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"},"path":{"type":"string"}},"required":["error","status","timestamp"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}},"404":{"description":"No invitation with given `id` found.","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"timestamp":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"error":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"},"path":{"type":"string"}},"required":["error","status","timestamp"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}}}}
>
